candidate_data.translated_summary: Java backend developer (~3.5 years) specialized in eGovFrame/Spring Boot. Built an electronic attendance system for 100+ schools, refactored complex queries to cut latency from ~4s to ~0.3s (>90%), improved page load UX with Vue team, and stabilized batches with auto-alerts. Scouted by a bank BU.

Experience.company: Shinhan Bank — HeyYoung Campus (via Rotex → Seedin)
highlights_en: Attendance backend on eGovFrame; DB transaction tuning; 100+ schools served
Refactored JOIN/WITH queries to reduce response ~4s→~0.3s
Collaborated with Vue team on skeleton UI and payload simplification
Batch stabilization and auto-alerts; ~60% faster incident response

Education.en: Myongji College (Assoc.), Korea National Open University (enrolled)

Communication: Partnered with the Vue team to improve initial load UX and payloads.
Problem_Solving: Reduced API latency by >90% via query refactoring and tuning.
Collaboration_Teamwork: Cross-functional work with FE team to implement skeleton UI and optimize responses.
Customer_Impact: Improved mobile UX and system responsiveness for 100+ schools.
Operational_Excellence: Stabilized batch jobs and introduced auto-alerts for faster incident response.
